name: Sully Beans (Inside The Port Arthur Clinic)
address: 194 Court Street North (Inside The Port Arthur Clinic)
text:
Main Menu
Hours: 8:00 am – 2:00 pm
Soup & Baked Goods
Soup of the Day (Tomato Basil Bisque): 6oz for $3.15 | 12oz for $6.25
Baked Goods: Muffin, Croissant, Cinnamon Roll
Cookie (x2): $2.50

Price: $6.80 Bread options: White or Brown

Hot Chocolate: $2.47 | $2.81 | $3.15

Bagels: $2.00 / $3.00
